Mahmoud Ben Mahmoud (amụrụ na 1947, Tunis) bụ onye edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Tunisia.

A mụrụ Mahmoud na 1947 na Tunis, Tunisia, n'ezinụlọ sitere na Turkey nke biri na Tunisia na 1710. Nna ya bụ onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe na onye na-ese ihe na odee, nke, ruo n'ókè ụfọdụ, metụtara àgwà nke Mahmoud mgbe ọ na-eto eto
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri INSAS Belgian ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mpaghara ihe nkiri
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme, nkà mmụta ihe ochie na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum Free nke Brussels (ULB)
Ọmụmụ ihe ndị a nyere ya ọzụzụ siri ike iji chee ihu n'ọrụ ihe nkiri.

O bu ụzọ gbalịa ime ya dị ka onye na-ede ihe nkiri site na isonye na edemede nke ihe nkiri abụọ: The Son of Amr's death (Le Fils d'Amr est mort) nke Jean-Jacques Andrien na Kfar Kassem nke Borhane Alaoui. N'oge na-adịghị anya, Mahmoud mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya Crossings (Traversées) na 1982
A họọrọ ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya, nke e wepụtara na 1992, Chichkhan, Diamond Dust (Chichkhan, poussière de diamant) maka Directors' Fortnight na Cannes Film Festival

Mahmoud ewepụtakwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'etiti afọ 1992 na 2006, dị ka: Italiani dell'altra riva (1992), Anastasia de Bizerte (1996), Albert Samama-Chikli (1996), Ennejma Ezzahra (1998), The Thousand and One Voices (2001), Fadhel Jaibi, a Theatre in Freedom (2003) na The Beys of Tunis, a colonial monarchy in turmente (Les Beys de Tunis, une monarchie dans la tourmente) 2006
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ ka na-aga n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri ndị gosipụtara ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ọrụ ihe nkiri, dị ka Naps grenadines nke e wepụtara na 2003.
